text: Avane, i granthavannu nimage ilisikottavanu. Idaralli khacita vacanagalive – avugale i granthada sara. Innu, idaralli bahu arthada vacanagalu ive. Tam'ma manas'sugalalli vakrate ullavaru, i paiki bahu arthada vacanagala hinde nadeyuttare. Avaru i mulaka gondalada bennu hidiyuttare mattu vikrta vyakhyanagalannu arasuttiruttare. Nijavagi, avugala sariyada vyakhyanavannu ballavanu allahana horatu beraru illa. Pakvavada jnana ullavaru matra, ‘‘navu idannu nambiruvevu, idellavu nam'modeyana kadeyindale bandide’’ ennuttare. Nijavagi bud'dhivantara horatu beraru patha kaliyuvudilla
